task_prompt:
You are testing the PDF MCP server. IMPORTANT: First use toolbelt_list_tools to discover available tools, then use toolbelt_add_tool to add each tool before using it.

After adding tools, execute:
1. create_pdf with directory='/', file_name='test.pdf', content=[{"type": "paragraph", "text": "Hello"}]
2. read_pdf_pages with file_path='/test.pdf'

Report results from each call.
